Description: The FHIR Medication resource defines detailed information about a medication order's product or package. The Medication resource is not specific to any patient.
SampleResponse:
<Medication xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">

<product>

<form>

<text value="Tablet" />

<coding>

<system value="urn:oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.5552.1.7.4.698288.310" />

<code value="55" />

<display value="Tablet" />

</coding>

</form>

</product>

<code>

<text value="LISINOPRIL 10 MG PO TABS" />

<coding>

<system value="urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.88" />

<code value="314076" />

<display value="LISINOPRIL 10 MG PO TABS" />

</coding>

</code>

</Medication>

Medication.Name: Medication
Medication.Description: An instance of the DSTU2 Medication FHIR resource.

code.Name: code
code.Description: A code (or set of codes) that identify this medication. Usage note: This could be a standard drug code such as a drug regulator code, RxNorm code, SNOMED CT code, etc. It could also be a local formulary code, optionally with translations to the standard drug codes.

product.Name: product
product.Description: Information that only applies to products (not packages).

form.Name: form
form.Description: Describes the form of the item. Powder; tables; carton.
